sentences.sContent: Ballet is essentially a middle-class interest.
sentences.sCn: 芭蕾舞基本上是中产阶级感兴趣的东西。

sentences.sContent: Suicide rates have remained essentially unchanged.
sentences.sCn: 自杀率基本上保持不变。

sentences.sContent: Essentially, we are talking about the cold war period.
sentences.sCn: 我们基本上是在谈论冷战时期。

words.tran: 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的
重要性；本质；真髓；根本性

trans.tranOther: used when stating the most basic facts about something
